answer_en: MyCanada Newcomer Assistant is an AI-powered guide to help newcomers find settlement services, community supports, and basic information in Canada.
answer_am: ማይካናዳ ኒውኮመር አሲስተንት ለአዲስ መጡት የማደ Settling አገልግሎቶችን፣ የማህበረሰብ ድጋፍ እና መረጃ ለማግኘት የሚረዳ የAI መመሪያ ነው።
answer_so: MyCanada Newcomer Assistant waa kaaliye AI ah oo ka caawiya soo-galootiga helidda adeegyada dejinta, taageerada bulshada iyo macluumaad aasaasi ah ee Kanada.

question_en: How do I apply for a Social Insurance Number (SIN)?
answer_en: You can apply for a SIN online or in person at a Service Canada office. You will need your passport or immigration document.
answer_am: SIN መስራት በመስመር ላይ ወይም በService Canada ቢሮ በኩል ይቻላል። ፓስፖርትዎ ወይም የመግቢያ ሰነድዎ ያስፈልግዎታል።
question_so: Sideen ugu dalban karaa Social Insurance Number (SIN)?
answer_so: Waxaad SIN ugu dalban kartaa onleen ama adigoo aadaya xafiiska Service Canada. Waxaad u baahan doontaa baasaboorkaaga ama dukumeentigaaga socdaalka.
